Name: Eazie

Name: Eazie
Review Text: Great food, healthy and delicious for a really good price, great if you're on a budget and traveling as you get a good quality meal for not much money! Very generous portion sizes as well. Quick service, would definitely recommend for a quick, cheap meal!

Review Text: Amsterdam does it again with fast casual. Good and healthy woks literally right next to the tram stop. Beautiful and clean toilets and a nice selection of magazines and other reading material at tables with USB ports and plugs. A bit pricey.
